
### label(%rip)

* [ AT&amp;T]{.my-small} <code>0x1234(%rip)</code> / [Intel]{.my-small} <code>[RIP + 0x1234]</code>  
  * value in memory 0x1234 bytes after current instruction

<hr class="vspace"/>

* `thing: .quad 42`<br />...<br />`movq thing(%rip), %rax`<br />
  * _special case in Linux assembler_:<br/>
    if movq ends at 0x7000 and thing is at 0x5000, then…<br/>
    = <code>movq -0x2000(%rip), %rax</code>  (_not_ `movq 0x5000…`)
